title: 2014 Great Dane Everest SS Refrigerated Semi-Trailer
item_description:
2014 Great Dane Everest SS Semi-Trailer

Trailer Details

  • Year: 2014
  • Make: Great Dane
  • Model: Everest SS B Enclosed Trailer
  • VIN: 1GRAA0626EW703154
  • License: 4PN8925
    • Expiration Date: 9/30/2028
  • Trailer Type: Enclosed Refrigerated
  • Refrigeration Unit Hours Reads: 28524

Dimensions

  • Overall Length: 628”
  • Overall Width: 96”
  • Overall Height: 158”
  • Deck Length: 606
  • Deck Width: 97”
  • Side Height: 103”

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Suspension: Air Ride
  • Number of Axles: 2
  • Brake Type: Air
  • Number of Wheels: 8
  • Tire Size: 295/75R22.5
  • Electric Plug Type: 7-Way Round
  • Hitch: 5th Wheel

Note: This item was repossessed by the Bank; the Certificate of Title, Certificate of Repossession, and Transfer Form will be mailed 1-2 weeks following the removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of the inspections, transfer, registration, taxes, and fees due to DMV.
